title: Bleach - ブリーチ
description: Ichigo Kurosaki, a high school student who gains the powers of a Soul Reaper (Shinigami) after a chance encounter with a Soul Reaper named Rukia Kuchiki. He must then protect his town from evil spirits called Hollows and guide departed souls to the afterlife, a role he takes on after Rukia is injured while protecting him. The story evolves into an action-packed adventure with intense sword fights and deep lore as Ichigo and his friends face various enemies in both the human world and the Soul Society.
author: Tite Kubo
